modName: Christmas Lanterns Patch for ETAC Complete
summary: Just in time for Yuletide season, this ETAC patch makes best use of Christmas Lanterns from MannyGT, updating it for 13.4. Happy Holidays!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#ff0000]Christmas Lanterns Patch [/color][color=#00ff00]for Expanded Towns and Cities[/color][/b][/size]
[i]formerlyÂ Unofficial ETAC Complete Patch for Christmas Lanterns

[/i][b]THIS NOT-FOR PROFIT MOD CAN BE DOWNLOADED AND USED FREE OF CHARGE[/b][/center]

Yes, I still enjoy using ETAC because it provides loads of convenience for a wandering warrior. However, since nobody has taken up the challenge, and seeing that an update is long overdue, especially this year's Yuletide season, I decided to take matters into my hands and made this patch.

Note that this patch will work only for [b]Expanded Towns and Cities COMPLETE 13.4 [/b]and up. Of course it requires both ETAC and MannyGT's Christmas Lanterns mod.

[color=#ff0000]Also note that I have NOT yet covered the add-ons for Whiterun Exterior Market and Dragon Bridge South, and I may or may not create further patches, time permitting, for the modular version unless I have to figure out a way to split up the mod into several pieces.[/color]

[b][color=#00ff00]AREAS COVERED[/color][/b]

[list][*]Riverwood
[/*][*]Ivarstead
[/*][*]Darkwater Crossing
[/*][*]Dragon Bridge (Original North ONLY... for now.)
[/*][*]Rorikstead
[/*][*]Kynesgrove
[/*][*]Karthwasten
[/*][*]Shor's Stone
[/*][*]Stonehills
[/*][*]Morthal
[/*][*]Dawnstar
[/*][*]Falkreath
[/*][*]Winterhold
[/*][/list]
[b][color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION & LOADLIST ORDERING[/color][/b]

Install as you would by any means, be it NMM, MO, or manual -- just copy the patch into the Skyrim DATA directory.
This patch must [i]strictly[/i] follow after Christmas Lanterns and ETAC Complete, regardless of whether you use BOSS or LOOT.

[b][color=#00ff00]UNINSTALLATION[/color][/b]

Just deactivate, then delete or move.

[b][color=#00ff00]CREDITS/MILLE GRAZIE[/color][/b]

missjennabee -- Expanded Towns and Cities 13.4 ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608 )
MannyGT (gave permissions) -- Christmas Lanterns ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27845 )

Peace on Nirn and Goodwill to All Men, Mer, Khajit and Argonians alike.

[b][color=#00ff00]NOTICES[/color][/b]

This mod shall be only released exclusively for Nexus and TESA. Any other modification, or uploading to other sites is strictly prohibited without the permission of the mod author(s).
author: sa547
